job title: Associate Research Scientist (Operations Support resource I (Clinical)
job description:
Title: Associate Research Scientist

Purpose&Scope

Seeking a mid-level and well-trained laboratory technician, who will assist the projects directed by Astellas employees. Candidates should have general laboratory skills in molecular biology, histology, and animal handling in the field of neuroscience.

General Responsibilities and Required Skills
  • General techniques in molecular biology and biochemical techniques including quantitative PCR and ELISA.
  • Experience in histological tissue processing (brain sectioning, immunohistochemistry, fluorescence/confocal microscopy, imaging analysis).
  • Experience in mouse handling.
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Ability to maintain experimental records, and collect and analyze data.
  • Summarize and present data at internal meetings.
  • Proficiency in stereotaxic surgery would be plus.
  • Proficiency in primary neuronal cultures would be plus.
Requirements:

Qualifications

Bachelor degree in science

At least 1 year experience in a research setting

Ability to work independently while function within a team environment

Type:Temp/ContractLocation:San Diego, CA
